t: Do Amazon E-Books Work With the Nook?
s: October 27, 2016 - The Nook Color e-reader is distributed by Barnes & Noble for use with its Nook bookstore. A factory Nook Color doesn't have the capability to read Amazon e-books. The device itself runs a slimmed down version of the Android operating system. It comes with stock applications including the Nook ...

t: Compare NOOKs | Barnes & Noble®
s: See what makes our Tablets and eReaders so exceptional. Choose the NOOK that's best for you.

t: Kindle eBooks on NOOK – Barnes & Noble
s: Kindle eBooks cannot be used with NOOK. The digital rights management (DRM) protection that Kindle eBooks use prevents them from being loaded to devices not sold by Amazon.

t: Barnes & Noble Nook - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - The Barnes & Noble Nook (styled nook or NOOK) is a brand of e-readers developed by American book retailer Barnes & Noble, based on the Android platform. The original device was announced in the U.S. in October 2009, and was released the next month. The original Nook had a six-inch E-paper display ...

t: Amazon.com: Barnes & Noble Barnes and Noble Nook Glowlight 4 eReader 6 32GB BNRV1100 Black (Renewed) : Electronics
Is there a way to move my books purchased from Amazon from Kindle to nook? - Quora
s: Answer: Why do you need to? Kindle and Nook are proprietary platforms designed to be totally incompatible. They share a basic format for the books, now, but didn’t used to. But porting from one to the other isn’t supposed to happen. Because 2 different competitor companies.
